metadata.title: USN-6621-1 -- ImageMagick vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that ImageMagick incorrectly handled certain values when processing BMP files. An attacker could exploit this to cause a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6621-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libmagick++-6.q16hdri-dev - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.15+esm3 libmagickwand-dev - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.15+esm3 imagemagick-6.q16 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.15+esm3 libmagickcore-6-headers - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.15+esm3 imagemagick-6-common - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.15+esm3 libmagick++-6.q16hdri-7 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.15+esm3 libmagickcore-6.q16-3-extra - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.15+esm3 libmagick++-6-headers - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.15+esm3 libimage-magick-q16-perl - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.15+esm3 libimage-magick-perl - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.15+esm3 libmagick++-dev - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.15+esm3 libmagickwand-6.q16-3 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.15+esm3 perlmagick - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.15+esm3 libmagickcore-6.q16hdri-3-extra - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.15+esm3 imagemagick - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.15+esm3 libmagickwand-6.q16hdri-dev - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.15+esm3 libmagickwand-6.q16-dev - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.15+esm3 libmagickcore-6.q16-3 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.15+esm3 libmagickcore-6.q16hdri-dev - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.15+esm3 libmagick++-6.q16-dev - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.15+esm3 libmagickwand-6.q16hdri-3 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.15+esm3 imagemagick-common - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.15+esm3 libmagickcore-6.q16-dev - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.15+esm3 imagemagick-doc - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.15+esm3 imagemagick-6-doc - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.15+esm3 libimage-magick-q16hdri-perl - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.15+esm3 libmagick++-6.q16-7 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.15+esm3 libmagickcore-6.q16hdri-3 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.15+esm3 libmagickcore-6-arch-config - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.15+esm3 imagemagick-6.q16hdri - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.15+esm3 libmagickcore-dev - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.15+esm3 libmagickwand-6-headers - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.15+esm3 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
